title: DAY IN MY LIFE AT THE FARM! Part 1

tasks.task: Unloading material and visiting the farm.
subtasks: Awakening early, around 7 AM, to feed the dogs Delilah and Benelli.
Walking the dogs around 7:30 AM.
Preparing and drinking coffee before heading to the farm.
Driving 20 minutes to reach the farm.
Searching for and moving pets like a baby bunny.
Checking on and potentially taking in a baby bunny.
Fixing a water line by snipping and replacing parts.
Applying glue to secure a PVC pipe repair.
Verifying the secured repair.
Collecting hay for horses.
Unloading horse hay and handling dogs found at the farm.
Posting found dogs on pet finder.
Purchasing garbage bags and shavings at Home Depot.
Transporting wood shavings back to the farm.
Consuming snacks during a long drive.
Repairing the water line and ensuring horses don't tamper with it.
Addressing ongoing binky rabbit issues at the farm.
Running an hour drive to Jay's for shavings.
Unloading shavings and managing inventory.

tasks.task: Contributing to maintenance and care activities.
subtasks: Painting (assumed from context).
Organizing and storing items.
Regularly visiting and managing the farm's resources.
Biscuit- and breakfast-related interactions with dogs.
Handling multiple errands including pet care, supply procurement, and public engagement.
